00069 void cleanup(int ret)
00070 {
00071   // stop all mpi clients
00072 
00073 #ifdef MPI
00074   int task=TASKFIN;
00075   BroadcastTask(&task);
00076 
00077   MPI_Finalize();
00078 #endif
00079  
00080   // terminate program with return code
00081   exit(ret);
00082 }

00486   double eintri, eproji;

00489 
00490   for (int i=0; i<nconst; i++)

00493 
00494   double einitial = eproji + alpha*eintri;

00499   Para q;

00501 
00502   // shaking the parameters ?

00507   // in FMD parameterization move SlaterDet to origin in phase space

00527 
00528   double e = eprojf + alpha*eintrf;

00536                            &eintrf, &eprojf);
00537 
00538   e = eprojf + alpha*eintrf;
00539 
00540   fprintf(stderr, "\nboosted:\tE = %8.3f MeV, Eproj = %8.3f, Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n\n",

00552 
00553     // orient SlaterDet

00556     // normalize SlaterDet
00557     normalizeSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00558 
00559     // in FMD parameterization we copy the relocated SlaterDet
00560     if (!strcmp(P.name, "FMD"))
00561       SlaterDetinitFMD(&Q, &q);
00562 
00563     // calculate the observables
00564     Observables Obs;

00566     calcObservables(&Int, &Q, &Obs);
00567 
00568     ensuredir("MIN");

00570     sprintf(outfile, "MIN/%s-minvapp.%d", parafile, (int) time(NULL));
00571 
00572     fprintf(stderr, "... writing Parameters to file %s\n", outfile);
00573 
00574     FILE* outfp;

00593             hbc*einitial, hbc*eproji, hbc*eintri);

00595             hbc*e, hbc*eprojf, hbc*eintrf);
00596 
00597     fprintObservables(outfp, &Int, &Q, &Obs);
00598 
00599     fprintf(outfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
00600     fprintf(outfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", P.name);
00601     P.Parawrite(outfp, &q);
00602  
00603     fprintf(outfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
00604     writeSlaterDet(outfp, &Q);
00605 
00606     fclose(outfp);  
00607   }
00608 
00609   // save minimization result in parafile
00610   {
00611     // no improvement ? then write initial parameters
00612     if (!overwrite && einitial < e) 
00613       P.Paraclone(&qinitial, &q);
00614 
00615     P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00616 
00617     // orient SlaterDet
00618     moveboostorientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00619 
00620     // normalize SlaterDet
00621     normalizeSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00622

00624     if (!strcmp(P.name, "FMD"))

00626

00640     fprintinfo(outfp);
00641 
00642     fprintf(outfp, "\n# minimized %s for %s in %s parameterization\n"
00643             "# projected on J^pi = %s\n"
00644             "# K-mixing: threshold: %f, minnorm: %f\n"
00645             "# optimized eigenvalue #%d\n"
00646             "# using %s interaction\n", 
00647             cm ? "< Hintr >" : "< H >", q.name, P.name, 
00648             AngmomtoStr(j, par == +1 ? 0 : 1),
00649             threshkmix, minnormkmix, ival+1,
00650             Int.name);
00651 
00652     fprintf(outfp, "\n# initial: e = %8.3f MeV, eproj = %8.3f MeV, eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
00653             hbc*einitial, hbc*eproji, hbc*eintri);
00654     fprintf(outfp, "# final:   e = %8.3f MeV, eproj = %8.3f MeV, eintr = %8.3f MeV\n", 
00655             hbc*e, hbc*eprojf, hbc*eintrf);
00656 
00657     if (overwrite)
00658       fprintf(outfp, "\n# overwrite flag: use new parameters\n\n");
00659     if (!overwrite && einitial < e)
00660       fprintf(outfp, "\n# no improvement by minimization: use initial parameters\n\n");
00661 
00662     fprintObservables(outfp, &Int, &Q, &Obs);
00663 
00664     fprintf(outfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
00665     fprintf(outfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", P.name);
00666     P.Parawrite(outfp, &q);
00667  
00668     fprintf(outfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
00669     writeSlaterDet(outfp, &Q);
00670 
00671     fclose(outfp);  
00672   }
00673 
00674   fprintf(stderr, "... %4.2f minutes computing time used\n", usertime()/60.0);
00675 
00676   cleanup(0);
00677 
00678 #ifdef MPI
00679   }
00680 #endif
00681 }
